title: Reprocussions for direct messages
body: This kid that I had blocked on a previous account added me from his smurf while I was in game and I couldn't remove him. The stuff he was saying was pretty gruesome and I just wish there's something we could do about that as a community

replies.body: When you left the match you were in I hope you remembered to block them! It's best to only add people you know so you're not inviting unwanted direct messages from people you don't know.

Oh I definitely did. I just feel as if he deserves a permaban for talking about killing my family and saying stuff like that ya know. When I was in game I was literally trapped and just had to read the things he was spamming. I know you probably can't do anything serious to his account but holy moly
